name: Energy Siege Shot, Greater
book: Pathfinder Roleplaying Game Ultimate Combat. © 2011, Paizo Publishing, LLC
target: one siege engine of any size
text: This spell functions like energy siege shot, except it can target siege engines of any size, not just Large siege engines.
target_zh: 一台任何大小的攻城器械
text_zh: 这个法术工作方式如同能量炮击 (Energy Siege Shot)，不过它可以作用于任何体积的攻城器械，而不只是大型的。
